mapper.insert: insert into tb_workload_log(user_id, project_id, workload_time, workload_description, workload_detail, work_start_time, work_end_time, create_time, update_time) values(#{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workloadTime, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{workloadDescription, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workloadDetail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workStartTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{workEndTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, now(), now())
